name: Royal Netherlands Football Association
goal: KNVB is the national federation of football clubs. We safeguard the interests of our members, both professional and amateur football players, the grassroots clubs and professional clubs. We facilitate thousands of competitive matches every weekend by organizing leagues, training referees, directors and trainers. We develop football as a concept for everyone. Our societal projects that support this goal are aimed at (not exclusively) making connection (crossing borders) through football, developing women's football, football for elderly, for handicapped players and for youth. We also employ initiatives on healthy behavior, integrity, fair play, technological innovations, sustainable accomodations.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
